DOC.detailed_description: Women polycystic ovary syndrome high risk develop diabetes . Apart primary ovarian defect , 10 % 40-50 % woman develop diabetes insulin resistance ( IR ) respectively . IR associate hyperinsulinemia recognize important pathogenic factor determine diabetes majority PCOS woman , particularly obesity present . Treating IR might reduce risk diabetes improve ovulation fertility PCOS woman . We recently find obese , IR men woman consume cod protein diet show 30 % improvement insulin sensitivity compare animal protein , also 24 % decrease high-sensitive C-reactive protein plasma concentration . Therefore , dietary fish protein could represent natural , safe practical mean improve insulin sensitivity PCOS woman IR , new non-pharmaceutical approach treatment multiple endocrine metabolic abnormality PCOS woman ( see outcome measure extensive description ) .
